price: دغه دى د مريم زوى عيسى او دغه ده د هغه په باب هغه ريښتوني خبره چې په هغې كې خلك شك كوي.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
